data: Upon the steep slope of a certain “bald” among the Great Smoky Mountains there lie, just at the verge of the strange stunted woods from which the treeless dome emerges to touch the clouds, two great tilted blocks of sandstone.
Craddock, Charles Egbert, 1850-1922; Frost, A. B. (Arthur Burdett), 1851-1928 [Illustrator]
browsing: literature|browsing: fiction|category: novels|category: american literature
